title: My Desk Setup for 2023. Minimalist but functional.
summary: I've curated a minimalist, clean, and an aesthetically pleasing workspace to maximize my productivity.

body.raw:
I've already created a video covering my desk setup, if you wish watch that instead click the card link down below. But I wanted to create a blog post to go along with it for those that prefer a quick read for all the links and resources that make up my desk setup. So here you go! To provide some background, I'm currently a Software Engineer by day and part time creator in the evenings. I spend tons of hours on my desk coding, editing photos or videos and learning new things. So I've put together a desk setup that allows me to be productive in both of these areas. Must make you aware that some of the following links are affiliate links, which means I get a small commission if you purchase through it. This is at no extra cost to you, but it does help me continue to create content. Thanks! ## The Desk First thing first is the desk, which is the centerpiece of a setup. I've had the privilege of testing the [Ergonofis Sway Desk](https://shrsl.com/49346), which was gifted to me. It's a game-changer, with a really slick control interface. Plus, it's got the aesthetics to match its functionality. They even thought about implementing an anti-collision system, preventing desk-related mishaps. The Ergonofis team also sent me their solid wood monitor riser / desk shelf. It's a pretty known and accepted notion that having your monitor at eye level is the best for your posture. So this desk shelf is a great way to do that. It's also a great way to add some style to your desk setup. - [Ergonofis Sway Desk](https://shrsl.com/49346): A versatile standing desk with intuitive preset heights. - [Ergonofis Desk Shelf](https://shrsl.com/49342): Elevate your workspace with a stylish solid wood shelf. - [Ergonofis Cable Management](https://shrsl.com/4933x): Keep your desk tidy with an effective cable management solution.
## Monitors and Lighting A high-quality monitor is a must for my work, and I've chosen the LG 34WN780. Its ergonomic stand offers complete control over screen positioning, allowing me to customize my view. Additionally, I've incorporated the BenQ Screen Bar Halo, a USB-powered lamp that provides consistent and glare-free illumination for my workspace. - [LG 34WN780 Monitor](https://amzn.to/3DJd86G): An excellent monitor with ergonomic versatility. - [BenQ Screen Bar Halo](https://amzn.to/3fUAfCi): A convenient USB-powered lamp for consistent desk illumination. ## Computer Setup My primary workhorse is the 16-inch MacBook Pro, a reliable and powerful companion. To streamline my connections and reduce cable clutter, I use an Anker USB-C hub. This setup allows me to focus on my work without distractions. For a superb audio experience, I turn to the AirPods Max, which provide exceptional sound quality and help me maintain my productivity. - [16-inch MacBook Pro](https://amzn.to/41fkhEH): A top-notch laptop for a seamless work experience. - [Anker USB-C Hub](https://amzn.to/3Dk9vCV): A solution that simplifies connections for a clean and organized workspace. - [Nomad MagSafe Dock](https://nomadgoods.com/products/stand-one-silver): A premium dock for MagSafe-compatible devices. ## Audio Audio quality is crucial to my workflow. I prefer to immerse myself in a world of sound using headphones, primarily the AirPods Max, renowned for their high-quality audio. It's worth noting that I rely on my headphones due to the limited quality of my monitor's built-in speakers. - [AirPods Max](https://amzn.to/3mie64b): My trusted headphones for an exceptional audio experience. - [Apple AirPods Pro](https://amzn.to/3UmMQhq): Compact and versatile earbuds suitable for various tasks. - [Sonos Beam Soundbar](https://amzn.to/46h5E6H): A wall-mounted soundbar that elevates my workspace to a mini theater. ## Peripherals I'm a mechanical keyboard enthusiast, and my current favorite is the Envoie by More Designs. Its unique build, combined with the GMK Dracula keycap set and a Tomorrow-themed set, adds a personal touch to my setup. To navigate efficiently, I rely on the Logitech MX Master III, which offers extra buttons and ergonomic comfort. - [Orbitkey Desk Mat](https://amzn.to/3Dm37eu): A functional desk mat with built-in storage, enhancing both aesthetics and organization. - [Mode Envoy Keyboard](http://modedesigns.com): Hands down, my favorite keyboard to date, with a unique design and exceptional build quality. - [Alexotos Linear Switches](https://modedesigns.com/products/alexotos-edition-switches): Linear switches that provide a smooth and satisfying typing experience. I get lot's of compliments about the sound. - [GMK Dracula Keycap Set](https://geekhack.org/): Custom keycaps that provide a unique and personalized look. - [Logitech MX Master III](https://amzn.to/3U5syHG): A versatile mouse designed to boost productivity. - [Magic Trackpad](https://amzn.to/46gxWyf): An alternative to a traditional mouse, featuring swiping gestures for added convenience. ## Chair and Ergonomics For enduring comfort during my long work sessions, I've chosen the Herman Miller Aeron chair. This ergonomic masterpiece is fully adjustable, and its lumbar support feature ensures that I maintain a healthy and comfortable posture throughout the day. - [Herman Miller Aeron Chair](https://www.hermanmiller.com): The ultimate ergonomic chair designed for long-lasting comfort. ## Miscellaneous Items To round out my workspace, I've included various practical items: - [Ikea Pegboard](https://www.ikea.com/us/en/p/skadis-pegboard-white-10321618/): A versatile and customizable pegboard for keeping essentials within easy reach. - [Govee RGB Floor Lamp](https://amzn.to/46m0CA): A smart lamp that sets the mood and adds a touch of ambiance to my workspace. - [Fellow Products Coffee Grinder](https://amzn.to/46CdXK8): A high-quality grinder that helps me prepare the perfect cup of coffee. - [Electric Kettle](https://amzn.to/46fGa9M): An electric kettle for quick and convenient brewing. - [Larq Water Bottle](https://amzn.to/48HyP4v): A self-cleaning water bottle that offers both convenience and sustainability. ## Conclusion That concludes my optimized workspace setup. As I continue to fine-tune my workspace, I'm open to suggestions and recommendations for adding a personal touch to the areas surrounding my desk

`,(0,r.jsxDEV)(n.p,{children:"A high-quality monitor is a must for my work, and I've chosen the LG 34WN780. `,(0,r.jsxDEV)(n.p,{children:"My primary workhorse is the 16-inch MacBook Pro, a reliable and powerful companion. To streamline my connections and reduce cable clutter, I use an Anker USB-C hub.
